turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I need to order a large, sorry a grande caffe mocha from a local Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, would you like any milk?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it and which starbucks location would you like to pick up from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The one on 23 Main Street in New Yok City.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, one moment while i send your order to that store.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, i have ordered you a grande caffe mocha with 2% milk and no whipped cream to be picked up at the starbucks on 23 main street in new york city.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Excellent. Thank you so much. That's it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your receipt will be texted to you, have a nice day.
